name: Anya, the Loyal Squire
description: A young knight-in-training, full of courage but lacking experience. Her loyalty is her greatest strength.

name: Elara, the Forest Scout
description: A sharp-eyed archer who knows the forests like the back of her hand. She is swift and precise.

name: Seraphina, the Sun Priestess
description: A gentle cleric who channels the sun's warmth to heal allies and sear foes. Her presence on the battlefield is a beacon of hope.

name: Kaelen, the Spellblade
description: A nimble warrior who infuses her blade with raw arcane energy. She strikes with deadly speed and power.

name: Isolde, the Iron Paladin
description: A veteran paladin clad in impenetrable armor. She acts as an unshakeable shield for her comrades.

name: Lunaria, the Void Empress
description: A legendary sorceress who once conquered a dimension of her own. She wields forbidden magic with terrifying might.

name: Freyja, the Valkyrie Ascendant
description: A warrior queen from a realm of gods. Her spear is said to be able to pierce the heavens themselves.
